attributes.action: Support Cardinal Murphy-O"Connor in urging Saint John"s & Saint Mary"s Hospital to remain steadfast to its Catholic Foundations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Cardinal requires support for this Hospital to remain true to the treatment and rights to life for children from conception.
This Hospital is one of the best in the U.K. and to remain so it must retain its Catholic Etho"s for Life,otherwise sadly be parted from the Church.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
